summary: This document is an email chain from December 2019 between Metropolitan Police (Counter Terrorism Policing) staff regarding the forwarding of an amended letter from a Deputy Assistant Commissioner to the United States Attorney, providing contact details for a relevant UK legal representative in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Rob
persons.role: Detective Sergeant - Staff Officer to Deputy Assistant Commissioner
persons.context: Metropolitan Police officer who sends and forwards emails containing an amended letter to the United States Attorney regarding UK/US contact details.

events.title: Forwarding of amended letter to US Attorney
events.description: Detective Sergeant Rob forwards an amended letter from the Deputy Assistant Commissioner (Specialist Operations) to the United States Attorney, correcting solicitor contact details.

locations: New Scotland Yard, 4th Floor, Richmond Terrace, Victoria Embankment, London SW1A 2JL, UK
keyFacts: The Metropolitan Police's Counter Terrorism Policing unit was involved in coordinating UK legal representation for matters related to the United States Attorney (likely Southern District of New York in the Epstein case).
An amended letter was sent to correct previously out-of-date solicitor contact information for the UK side.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal coordination between UK and US authorities regarding the Epstein investigation in December 2019.
